content:
# We have successfully harvested 20 more iron ore, updating our inventory to `{'coal': 8, 'iron-ore': 21, 'iron-plate': 5}`.
# With this new supply of iron ore, we can now distribute it to the furnaces to keep them busy.

# Let's distribute iron ore to all four furnaces. 
# We will insert 5 iron ore into each of the three furnaces that have 4 iron ore, and we will also add iron ore to the first furnace.

for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace}):
    insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 iron ore into each furnace.

# After distributing the iron ore, we should check the updated inventory and the status of the furnaces again.
print(f"Updated Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Furnace statuses: {[inspect_inventory(furnace) for furnace in get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})]}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
